body.name: Summit Appliance MDR245SS 24" Wide Built-In Drawer Microwave for Installation in Wall or Island Openings, 1.2 cu.ft. Interior, 115V AC/60 Hz, Black/SS
features: Built-in microwave designed for installation in wall or island openings
1.2 cu.ft. interior offers plenty of space for large dishes
Exterior features a brushed stainless steel trim to elevate your kitchen design
Brushed stainless steel in a modern shape that suits any kitchen style
Control panel is set at a slight angle, making it easier to read all of the functions in any position
"Melt" setting lets you choose from commonly melted items (buter, chocolate, cheese, or marshmallows) and "soften" lets you choose from butter, ice cream, or cream cheese +30 Seconds Function
11 levels of heat allow you to find the proper settings for every dish
Defrost by weight or time to best suit your preference
115V with cord included. Includes a pre-installed right angle NEMA 5-15 plug on a 54" long cord
body.description: Summit Appliance MDR245SS 24" Wide Built-In Drawer Microwave for Installation in Wall or Island Openings, 1.2 cu.ft. Interior, 115V AC/60 Hz, Black/SS Key Features: - Built-in microwave designed for installation in wall or island openings - 1.2 cu.ft. interior offers plenty of space for large dishes - Exterior features a brushed stainless steel trim to elevate your kitchen design - Brushed stainless steel in a modern shape that suits any kitchen style - Control panel is set at a slight angle, making it easier to read all of the functions in any position - "Melt" setting lets you choose from commonly melted items (buter, chocolate, cheese, or marshmallows) and "soften" lets you choose from butter, ice cream, or cream cheese +30 Seconds Function - 11 levels of heat allow you to find the proper settings for every dish - Defrost by weight or time to best suit your preference - Round rack to hold meat and other items in place when using the defrost setting - Option allows you to disable the end of cycle alert - Centered display shows a digital readout of the time or timer countdown - Drawer microwave oven can be installed in a wall or island cutout and under a built-in wall oven - 115V with cord included. Includes a pre-installed right angle NEMA 5-15 plug on a 54" long cord Specifications: - Height of Cabinet: 14.88" (38 cm) - Width: 23.5" (60 cm) - Depth: 23.25" (59 cm) - Depth with Handle: 25.13" (64 cm) - Depth with door at 90°: 38.38" (97 cm) - Capacity: 1.2 cu.ft. (34 L) - Door: Black/SS - Cabinet: Gray - Amps: 12.0 - Voltage/Frequency: 115 V AC/60 Hz - Weight: 33.0 lbs. (15 kg) - Shipping Weight: 41.0 lbs. (19 kg) - Wattage: 1000.0 - Controls: Digital - Digital Display: Yes - Specialized Cooking Buttons: Yes - Interior Height: 7.13" (18 cm) - Interior Width: 16.13" (41 cm) - Interior Depth: 16.75" (43 cm)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In island microwave
reviews.reviewText: Perfect due to the difficulty finding this particular item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this microwave drawer. I broke my shoulder a few years ago and can not raise it fully, so having a microwave drawer was safer for me instead of having hot things above my 4'10" height. The microwave works beautifully. My only complaint is the roughness that was displayed by the delivery man. Upside down and handled rough i was afraid it wouldn't work as I saw him throwing things around in truck.Love all the features.
